laboratory_examinations.findings: Lipase level of 1400. Follow-up lipase was 990.

Dilated central hepatic ducts; common bile duct measures 12 mm with complete obliteration of the lumen for approximately 15 mm length. Prominent pancreatic duct with a 14 x 19 mm T1 hypointense lesion at the pancreatic head. Trace perinephric fluid noted.
